channel.title: Motorstorm
channel.description: You like playing Motorstorm online? I think it rocks personally even the offline version is amazing. The new addition from the playstation store adds the option 'Wreckreation' to the main menu. Great use of a word. If you wanna give me a game online add me as a buddie and ill race you. The display name is Sanga282 and same on Fall of man if you want a game

item.title: Motorstorm
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

i personally think it rocks and FOM has released the new maps patch today and i am telling you now it is worth the £3.00

I think that the graphics and detail are pretty awesoume, but will fall down with so many others as “Just a racing game”
